markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Dream](/Traits.aspx?ID=299)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 308 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Creatures native to the [Dimension of Dreams](/Planes.aspx?ID=22) can be any alignment and possess a diverse array of abilities, although those associated with the nightmare realm of Leng are almost always evil and immune to that realm’s freezing temperatures.
name: Dream
